sentences.en: According to the assessor's statement, the fire damage was not severe.
sentences.cn: 根据估价员的估计, 火灾损失并不严重.

sentences.en: Both major and minor nonconformities will be followed up by the assessor.
sentences.cn: 审核员应该跟踪严重不合格和一般不合格项的关闭.

sentences.en: Certificates referred to an assessor at least takes 4 - 6 weeks to return to us.
sentences.cn: 提交报告的结果我们会在四至六周内得到回复.

sentences.en: New Orleans now has one elected tax assessor - instead of seven, each overseeing his own fief.
sentences.cn: 新奥尔良现在有一位民选的税务稽核员, 而非再是七位各管一摊.

sentences.en: The assessor asserts that he inserted the deserted desserts in the desert with alert.
sentences.cn: 估价人认定他警惕地把被抛弃的甜点心插入沙漠中.

sentences.en: The assessor asserts that he insmerted the deserted desserts in the desert with alert.
sentences.cn: 估价人认定他用警惕把被抛弃的甜点心插入沙漠中.

sentences.en: There will be no automatic follow up by the assessor.
sentences.cn: 不需要审核员跟踪关闭.

sentences.en: Why to get this child to circle stage act as an assessor along circuit?
sentences.cn: 为什么不领这小孩绕陪审台走一圈 呢 ?

words.tran_cn: 可估价的；可评价的；可征收的；可征税的
财产价值已被估定之人

trans.tran_cn: 技术顾问，评税员，估价员，陪审法官，助理法官
trans.tran_en: someone whose job is to calculate the value of something or the amount of tax someone should pay
